Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel

This package contains classes for creating a BPEL model and for implements a standalone BPEL engine for testing designs.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IAeActivity Describes the interface used for interacting with business process activities
IAeBaseProcessEvent A base interface for process events.
IAeBusinessProcess Describes the interface used for interacting with business processes
IAeBusinessProcessEngine Describes the interface used for interacting with a business process engine
IAeContextWSDLProvider Provides access to all WSDL available to a deployment context.
IAeEndpointReference Describes the interface used for interacting with business processes.
IAeEngineAlert Event for reporting alert events to engine listeners.
IAeEngineEvent Interface for engine events
IAeEngineListener Interface for engine listeners.
IAeEvent An interface for a generic event.
IAeExpressionLanguageFactory This interface must be implemented by any classes desiring to function as an expression language factory.
IAeFault Interface describing a fault which can be the result of an operation or runtime error.
IAeFaultTypeInfo Provides the type info for the fault
IAeInvokeActivity Describes an invoke object that reports whether it's a one way operation or not.
IAeLocatableObject Defines a common interface for bpel objects and variables, both of which are referred to by location paths or ids.
IAeMonitorListener Interface for engine listeners.
IAePartner Describes the interface used for interacting with business process partners
IAePartnerLink Describes the interface used for interacting with business process partner links.
IAePlanManager Provides a mechanism to map/cache a process QName to its description which contains the required information to dispatch an inbound request to a specific process instance or create a new process.
IAeProcessEvent Interface for process events.
IAeProcessInfoEvent Interface for process information events.
IAeProcessListener Interface for process listeners.
IAeVariable Describes the interface used for interacting with business process variables these Business Process variables are associated with either messages or standard schema described xml data.
IAeWSDLProvider Interface which defines a provider of WSDL definitions.
 

Class Summary
AeBuildNumber Resource file which contains the build number and build date.
AeEngineEventFormatter Basic engine event formatting.
AeExpressionLanguageFactory This implementation of the expression language factory uses the engine configuration file to map expression languages to implementations of validators and runners.
AeMessageDataFactory The factory for creating message data implementations which contain the data for variables in a bpel process.
AeMessages Accessor class for externalized strings
AeNamespaceFilteredWSDLIterator Provides a namespace specific iterator over the available resource keys
AeWSDLDefHelper Utility helper class to do various WSDL definition lookups.
AeWSDLPolicyHelper Utility helper class to do various WSDL policy attachment lookups.
 

Exception Summary
AeBusinessProcessException Describes the standard exception thrown by business process layer
AeStaticAnalysisException This exception indicates some error within the business process that should have been caught during the static analysis of the business process.
 

Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel Description

This package contains classes for creating a BPEL model and for implements a standalone BPEL engine for testing designs.
